    http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/product/hospitality/v1

    Facet BasicPropertyInfo_Detail

      • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/product/hospitality/v1:BasicPropertyInfo_Summary
        • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/product/hospitality/v1:BasicPropertyInfo_Detail

    • Example XML

      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

<BasicPropertyInfoDetail brandCode="FS" brandName="Full Service" chainCode="MC" chainName="Marriott" cityCode="WAS" code="WASJW" name="JW Marriott Washington DC" xmlns="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/product/hospitality/v1"/>

      Example JSON

      {
  "BasicPropertyInfoDetail" : {
    "code" : "WASJW",
    "name" : "JW Marriott Washington DC",
    "cityCode" : "WAS",
    "chainCode" : "MC",
    "chainName" : "Marriott",
    "brandCode" : "FS",
    "brandName" : "Full Service"
  }
}

      • Attribute Summary

        Attributes 
        Name Description
        name
        Specifies the proper name of the property.
        Details
        Type StringShort
        Example Value JW Marriott Washington DC
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        cityCode
        Specifies the three character IATA city code.
        Details
        Type StringTiny
        Example Value WAS
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        chainCode
        Identifies the chain.
        Details
        Type StringTiny
        Example Value MC
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        chainName
        Specifies the proper name of the chain.
        Details
        Type StringShort
        Example Value Marriott
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        brandCode
        Identifies a brand with in a chain (e.g. Courtyard, Hampton Inn). This code is optional if the hotel is an independent property that can be identified by a propert code alone.
        Details
        Type StringTiny
        Example Value FS
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        brandName
        Identifies the proper name of the brand.
        Details
        Type StringShort
        Example Value Full Service
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
